name: Super Fart Quest
description:
Super Fart Quest, a game that will make you fart of RAGE!

A game made by Diel Mormac for Kolks Game Jam Ebuff Edition

An accident involving the TMP (Transports of Magic Powder) carriage, made all the loads spreading in the city causing a 'fart' epidemic. That's right, it seems that the air around the village are not the best.

But you, a brave peasant who decides to risk your life crossing the dangerous forest full of dark creatures to visit the old hut of the Mad Mage seeking an antidote that can save the village.

Good luck and lots of patience ... you will need!

**This version contains 17 levels**
